fields.name: What_Type_of_Early_Termination_Is_This
fields.fieldText: What type of early termination is this?

fields.name: IsItEarlyTerm
fields.fieldText: Check the following box if this is an early termination. This includes termination agreements, sublets, ghosts and evictions.

fields.name: When_did_this_member_give_notice
fields.fieldText: When did this member give notice?

fields.name: Churn_Explanation_3A
fields.fieldText: Please enter a free-text explanation for the reason for churn. Keep this concise and easy for others to understand.

fields.name: Churned_Member_Experience
fields.fieldText: How would the member rate their overall satisfaction with their experience at Common?

fields.name: Notice_Date_0
fields.fieldText: When did the legal team confirm we can remove access for this person and start turnover work? Please note this must match the Notice Date in Beacon. Standard move out tasks will be due the day after this date.**

fields.name: churn_Reason_eviction_or_ghost
fields.fieldText: Was this an issue of Lease Violations or Delinquent Payments?

fields.name: churn_Explanation_0
fields.fieldText: Please add further details relevant to this member churning - this should be kept brief.

fields.name: When_did_the_member_sign_their_termination_agreement_or_when_did_the_replacement
fields.fieldText: When did the member sign their termination agreement or when did the replacement member sign their new lease? Please note this must match the Notice Date in Beacon.**

fields.name: Member_NEW_End_Date
fields.fieldText: What is the member’s new end date? Standard move out tasks will be due the day after this date. **

fields.name: When_is_the_member_financially_responsible_until
fields.fieldText: When is the member financially responsible until? (e.g. if the member signed a termination agreement to end their lease on 8/31/20 with a one month fee, they are financially responsible until 9/30/20)

fields.name: churn_Explanation
fields.fieldText: Please enter further details about the member's reason for churn - this should be kept brief.

fields.name: DisplayCreateTasks
fields.fieldText:
As a reminder, you must manually create move out tasks for this member and all of their co-occupants because the end dates have already passed. Once the tasks are created, remember to check off the "Member Move Out Tasks Created" checkbox as well.


Instructions can be found here.


Please click next to finish this flow.

fields.name: successMessage
fields.fieldText: You've completed this flow - all members will be moved to Closed Lost once you click "Finish."

fields.name: Check_Couples
fields.fieldText: Are the following members also churning? Please check off all that apply. If the member has a co-leaseholder that is not shown here, please ensure the start date, end date, home, suite, and room are the same on all renewal opportunities.

fields.name: Churned_Member_Experience_Early_term
fields.fieldText: How would the member rate their overall satisfaction with their experience at Common?
